OMEO isn't created in isolation. I'd really like to thank the following entities!

  • The Gamepedia Minecraft wiki for listing the exact anvil rules;
  • Sunnypwang's Anvil Calculator for coming before me and making it easy for me to verify my algorithm results;
  • GitHub for hosting this project for me;
  • jQuery for making JavaScript much easier to use;
  • RealFaviconGenerator for making it super easy to add favicons to your web pages;
  • And of course, Mojang for making Minecraft!
